text: Tiruchi District Cricket Association (TDCA) will conduct trials to select the Tiruchi district team for the S.S. Rajan Trophy inter-district cricket tournament. The trials will be held at AKKV School, Annamalai Nagar, here on March 16 at 6 a.m. Details can be obtained from P. Ilangovan, secretary, TDCA (ph: 9443766869).
title: Cricket selection trials
